Alhaji Habu Adamu Jajere bụbu onye isi oche otu Independent Petroleum Marketers Association Of Nigeria (IPMAN)
O duuru ọgbakọ ahụ afọ anọ

Habu Jajere bụ onye mmeri nke Dr Kwame Nkurumah African Leadership Award na Ghana.[][] Alhaji Habu Adamu Jajere Independent Petroleum Marketers Association Of Nigeria N'ụlọ ọrụ 2003-2007 Buru ya ụzọ Chief (Dr.) Bestman P
Anekwe Nkọwa nkeonwe Amụrụ 1954 (afọ 67–68) Katagum (Azare), Bauchi State, Nigeria Ugbu a ọ bụ onye isi ọzọ na B.S
Ọ gụrụ Advanced Marketing na North East London Polytechnic
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Bauchi State Ministry of Commerce tupu ọ banye na Nigeria National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC)
Ọ nọnyere Pipelines & Products Marketing Company (PPMC) afọ 15 tupu ọ banye azụmaahịa nkeonwe
Ruo ọtụtụ afọ ọ bụ onye isi ala nke Independent Petroleum Marketers Association of Nigeria (IPMAN) nke nwere ihe karịrị 600 netwọk nke ụlọ ahịa na mmanụ ala na-asọmpi nke ọma na ndị isi ahịa
Ọ bụ onyeisi oche / CEO nke Hajaaj Nigeria Ltd
A mụrụ Habu Jajare na 1954, ma lụọla nwanyị nwere ụmụ isii.
